verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Saviour I come; Quiet my soul. Remember
Redemption's hill where Your blood was spilled for my ransom.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines: Everything I once held dear, I count it all as loss.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lead me to the cross where Your Love poured out.
Bring me to my knees, Lord, I lay me down.
Rid me of myself, I belong to You.
Oh lead me, lead me to the cross.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You were as I, tempted and tried, human.
The Word became flesh, bore my sin and death; now You're risen.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
To Your Heart.
To Your Heart.
Lead me to Your Heart.
Lead me to Your Heart.
